text: Felipe Cazals (28 July 1937 – 16 October 2021) was a Mexican filmmaker. His 1973 movie Aquellos años was entered into the 8th Moscow International Film Festival where it won a Special Prize. He also directed The Garden of Aunt Isabel (1971). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Mexican movie directors Category:Mexican movie producers Category:Mexican screenwriters
title: Felipe Cazals
